content: I don't have personal experience cooking, but i can say that mason jar salads are one of the easiest meal prep options. you can chop up your ingredients ahead of time and layer them into jars. these can be made in 10-15 minutes and don't require any cooking. just be sure to store them in the fridge until you're ready to eat. you can make a few at once to have for the week, and you can switch up the ingredients so that you don't get bored.
